lexUnit.definition: COD: reject in an abrupt or ungracious manner.

sentence.text: Soon after this statement , in November 1979 , Taraki 's successor Hafizullah Amin reportedly rebuffed a Soviet request to establish an air base at Shindand near the Iranian border .
